body_html: @danmane I did sign CLA on both accounts I used to write the code, but for one of them after the pull request was submitted. I assume this didn't trigger CLABot reevaluation, as the action was taken outside of Github. Is there a way to force CLABot to run its check again?
body_text: @danmane I did sign CLA on both accounts I used to write the code, but for one of them after the pull request was submitted. I assume this didn't trigger CLABot reevaluation, as the action was taken outside of Github. Is there a way to force CLABot to run its check again?
body: @danmane I did sign CLA on both accounts I used to write the code, but for one of them after the pull request was submitted. I assume this didn't trigger CLABot reevaluation, as the action was taken outside of Github. Is there a way to force CLABot to run its check again?
